price: Pero este día los creyentes serán quienes se rían de los que rechazaron la verdad.
arabic: فَٱلۡيَوۡمَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ مِنَ ٱلۡكُفَّارِ يَضۡحَكُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: fal-yawma alladhīna āmanū mina al-kufāri yaḍḥakūna
